summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the TorchScript export and execution workflow for Lightning modules, covering tracing, input/output handling, device placement, state retention, saving/loading (including custom filesystems), and edge cases such as missing inputs or invalid methods.
business_intent: Guarantee that Lightning models can be reliably compiled to TorchScript for production deployment, enabling consistent inference across platforms and ensuring that serialization, device management, and custom storage integrations work as expected.
